func.title: GetPlayerInfoCoreVal

param.name: entry
param.desc: Name of the entry to be retrieved.

param.name: section
param.desc: Section of the entry to be retrieved. If not specified, all sections will be searched for an entry of the specified name.

param.name: player
param.desc: Player of which to retrieve an entry.

param.name: entry_number
param.desc: Index of the value to be retrieved if an entry contains multiple values.

func.desc: Returns the property value of a player by its name in the Player.txt.
func.remark: For technical reasons there can not be a corresponding function SetPlayerVal.
